```{r echo = FALSE}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, readxl, knitr, kableExtra, Hmisc)
```

# Gaussian lineare Regression

```{r}

data_tbl <- read.csv2("data/flea_dog_cat_length_weight.csv")

```

```{r}
ggplot(data_tbl, aes(weight, jump_length)) +
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth(method = "lm")


ggplot(data_tbl, aes(weight, jump_length, color = sex, shape = animal)) +
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth(method = "lm")
```
